notes.logistics: Online tournament via Discord. Runs from 7:45 AM - 5:50 PM (PST). Participants must join the Discord server as soon as possible.

format.summary: Amador Valley Extravaganza of Science 2 - Online Science Bowl tournament

registration.instructions: One person from each school fills out the registration form. After registration, participants join the Discord server and each team pays the tournament fee. Field size is capped at 48 teams - due to high interest, teams are advised to register as soon as possible!
